text: 10:19: Jôk 20:13; Bal 5:17; Jôk 20:14; Bal 5:18; Jôk 20:15; Bal 5:19; Jôk 20:16; Bal 5:20; Jôk 20:12; Bal 5:16 Balam chongpêkngei ha chu ni riet duo: ‘Mi that no roh; inrê no roh; inru no roh; adikloitakin tute bâtu tho no roh; mi huong no roh; nu nû le na pa jâ roh ti ngei hih’” a tia.
